title: Lime and coriander guacamole salad
description: Serve this guacamole salad recipe with spiced crumbed fish, paprika and chilli sweet potato chips and chocolate and raspberry cheesecake pots for a casual feast for friends, ready in under an hour.
ingredients: 2 large ripe avocados, halved and thinly sliced
Grated zest and juice of 1 lime
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely chopped
